title: Magnetic board lettering font?
content:
Hi!

I am going to make a fake mugshot picture. So I am looking for a font stimulating magnetic lettering on a board typically hold by someone on a mugshot. With letters being 'scrambled', all with different angles.

Does anyone know of such, preferably free, font?
author: korneevxxx

comments.content:
Most mugshots I've seen use some variation of Helvetica in all-caps. Why not just manually adjust certain letters?

- Lex
Lex, thank you for the answer. The truth I will have to make 12 of such mugshots and I have very little time :(

What Lex describes could have been easily done  
in the time since you first started this thread.

hhp
